name: 20 Game Mega Pack (digital download only)
description:
This is the 20 game pack of simple cause & effect games for children with learning difficulties and special educational needs. Find out more about the games at http://www.special-needs-software.co.uk.

The download is suitable for use on a PC or Mac and is a 47MB zip file. The game pack cannot be run on mobile phones or tablets.

** Please note that your computer and antivirus settings must allow downloading ZIP files containing programs (.exe files). **

Games in this pack include:

  • Alphabet Game
  • Bubble Colour
  • Bubbles
  • Bubbles & Birds
  • Burst the Balloon (original version – only available as part of this pack)
  • Bus Game
  • Busy Bee
  • Busy Street Game
  • Catching Fish
  • Fireworks
  • Ladybirds
  • Memory Doors
  • Paint the screen
  • Pairs
  • Piano
  • Rocket
  • Ski Slope
  • Splat Painting
  • Stars
  • Windmills High Contrast

Designed for mouse, switch or single-touch input. May not work as expected on multi-touch devices, so please try demo games on http://www.special-needs-software.co.uk before purchasing for a multi-touch device.
